plot: On Dec. 23, Larry eats some cookies in the kitchen. Turns out those cookies were a nativity scene that Cheryl's religious sister made. Since it's Christmas Eve, too late to get a replacement. Larry finds a live Nativity at a local church.

On December 23, Larry gets up to get a midnight snack and eats some cookies in the refrigerator. Unfortunately, those cookies were a nativity scene that Cheryl's devoutly religious sister was preparing, and now that it's Christmas Eve, it's too late to get a replacement, but Larry goes searching anyway, and finds a Live Nativity at a local church. Has the Grouch saved Cheryl's family's Christmas?—halo1k
